'''Deadwood Road Sign''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deadwood Road Sign is purchasable from [[Goth]] for {{Item|Mora|24|x=25,000}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 12h
|Fir Wood = 4
|sort = Fir Wood
}}
